abstract: While other states have been able to successfully move past their history with eugenics by acknowledging and redressing the harm caused, the issue of forcible sterilizations lingers in California.  As the California legislature dealt with a new breed of eugenic policies that emerged in the state penal system, is enough being done to address Californias reliance on forcible sterilizations?  This Comment addresses Californias history with forcible sterilization practices and the current issues with sterilization procedures in the California penal system, as well as what measures California has taken to remedy these issues.
title: Old Habits Die Hard: Past and Current Issues with Eugenics and Forcible Sterilizations in California
subject: law
